string.text: Okay, I'm in the lab. First off, I need to find the primary generator's remote control and then try and shut it down. Huh, this is some familiar smell here...
Well, well, well... the power is out. I have to find a way to run the primary generator unless I want to admit all this shit was for nothing.
A door is blocking my way, and I need to open it somehow. Labs like this one are probably filled with various electronics, so I want to look for a switch or something.
Hmm, I found the switch but it doesn't let me... switch it. Perhaps I have to find some access card or security codes: the switch has a panel, and it seems like I can type digits on it.
Damn it! The door is still closed. There's some panel fixed on the wall in front of the door, and it looks like I can type digits on it either. Do I have to search for another PC?..

Oh, the path is finally clear. To get this showdown dealt with I need to get to the main control room, enter the override codes into something and then... shut the bloody Generators down. I wonder what's up with Ghost at the moment...
So is this it? The room is a straight shot to. I need to enter the codes, and then - all or nothing.
